name: daskeyboard-applet--icmp-ping
description: Displays network latency as a color gradient.
longDescription: Displays ICMP ping response times as a color gradient depending the average round-trip time duration.

questions.label: Address
questions.help: Address of server to ICMP ping

questions.label: Fastest Ping Color
questions.help: Color indicating the fastest possible ping

questions.label: Slowest Ping Color
questions.help: Color indicating the slowest possible ping

questions.label: Blink on error
questions.help: Blink button if ping error occured

questions.label: Polling Interval (seconds)
questions.help: How often to ping the address (in seconds) and determine average response time. (Default: 60)

questions.label: Ping Count
questions.help: Number of pings to send per polling session (will be averaged). (Default: 5)

questions.label: Low Threshold (milliseconds)
questions.help: Start of gradient.  All ping times below this number will be considered green. (Default: 30ms)

questions.label: High Threshold (milliseconds)
questions.help: End of gradient.  All ping times above this number will be considered yellow. (Default: 1000ms)

questions.label: Use logarithmic scale for ping
questions.help: Instead of linear gradient use logarithmic scale. E.g. 30/1000 and 500ms ping, linear: 48%, logarithmic: 89%
